data.title: Katy Perry Tickets - 2024 Tour Dates
data.meta_description: Get Katy Perry Concert Tickets At TicketSmarter Today! Discover The Hottest Seats And Ticket Prices With Our Seating Chart.
data.text:
Katy Perry Concert Tickets

You’ll get to hear hits like “I Kissed a Girl” and “California Girls” live with Katy Perry tickets from TicketSmarter. Katy Perry, born Katheryn Hudson, is a singer, songwriter, and actress who started her music career singing in the church choir as a child. She was originally striving to be a gospel singer but switched to pop music after moving to Los Angeles and implementing her stage name in 2002. Her second album One of the Boys released in 2008 and was an instant hit. Since the album’s debut, it has accumulated 35 billion digital streams and won International Album of the Year at the NRJ Music Awards.

Katy Perry is a versatile pop music superstar whose albums and performances have won her numerous awards. Throughout her career, she has taken home 14 People’s Choice Awards and 5 Teen Choice Awards. Some of her best-selling singles include “Firework,” “Hot N Cold,” and “Teenage Dream.” Her 2020 single “Daisies” has been a hit among fans and critics. In addition to her booming pop music career, Perry is also an actress and television star. She has starred in films like The Smurfs and Zoolander 2. Get your Katy Perry tickets from TicketSmarter today to join in on all the fun at her next concert!

How much are Katy Perry tickets?

Katy Perry ticket prices will vary based on the type of performance. For her solo tours, the most common ticket types are general admission and reserved seats in the upper and balcony levels. At venues like Moda Center at the Rose Quarter in Portland, there are three different levels of seating available. Ticket prices for lower levels are around $100-$200 each, while upper levels further from the stage are around $50-$75 each. When she performs at festival events, ticket prices are based on how many days you are looking to attend and what other artists are scheduled to perform.

Katy Perry 2024 Tour Dates

Katy Perry has dominated the pop music scene for years and tours her vibrant, upbeat shows internationally. Her tours have featured performances from pop artists like Carly Rae Jepsen, Noah Cyrus, and Icona Pop. The Prismatic Tour featured her quirky, signature costumes and made stops at the BOK Center in Oklahoma, SAP Center in California, and the Tacoma Dome in Washington. Some of her international tours have had performances at venues like Brisbane Entertainment Center in Australia and Manchester Arena in the UK. Check out TicketSmarter’s artist schedule for the latest updates on Katy Perry tickets and tour dates.

When do Katy Perry tickets go on sale?

Katy Perry tours stop at incredible venues around the world and TicketSmarter is the number one spot for new updates and tickets. As soon as the tour is announced, tickets will be available on TicketSmarter. To help make your purchase quick and simple, no presale codes are needed for advanced sale Katy Perry concert tour tickets.

Songs from the Katy Perry Tour Setlist

Katy Perry's setlist while performing in Pula , 14 at “Forte Arena @ Forte Village Resort” included the following songs:

Dark Horse

Swish Swish

Chained to the Rhythm

Walking on Air

I Kissed a Girl

Cry About It Later

California Gurls

Teenage Dream

Roar

Firework

Source: Setlist.fm
